data.text:
Serena Williams Biography

Serena Williams first captured the world No. 1 tennis ranking in 2002 and has since gone on to win 23 Grand Slam championships, including seven Australian Opens, three French Opens, five Wimbledon championships and seven U.S Open championships. In 2002, she won three of the four Grand Slams and completed the career Grand Slam in 2003 in route to winning 64 World Tennis Association titles. While competing with her sister Venus she has captured another 14 Grand Slam doubles titles and won a total of 23 titles. She has also earned three gold medals in doubles at the 2000, 2008 and 2012 Olympic Games and one Gold Medal as a singles player at the 2012 London Olympics. On the mixed doubles circuit she has won another two Grand Slam titles at the 1998 Wimbledon and U.S. Open Championships. Outside of tennis she is a coowner of the Miami Dolphins, is a dedicated philanthropist, a best selling author, and serves as a valuable brand ambassador for some of the world’s most recognizable companies.

Book Serena Williams for your Next Event

Disclaimer: AthleteSpeakers assists companies seeking to hire talent like Serena Williams for speaking engagements, virtual meetings, appearances, product endorsements, and business sanctions. Our speakers bureau does not claim to exclusively represent Serena Williams. Our booking agency can help with finding an athlete or sports celebrity that aligns with your upcoming events date, location, and budget. When an organization request booking details for a celebrity like Serena Williams, we work closely with the client to make sure the proposed dates does not interfere with the requested athletes schedule. We then confirm the sports celebrity fee based on the details of the request. The fees listed on the speaker profile are rough estimates based on the previous market rate for the talent. Our team then works with Serena Williams's agent, manager or assistant on the booking request. For parties interested in hiring Serena Williams, we recommend filling out the booking request form so our booking agents can help with making your next event a success.

Interested in booking Serena Williams for a virtual meeting?

Contact Athlete Speakers today at 800-916-6008 to book Serena Williams for a virtual event, virtual meeting, virtual appearance, virtual keynote speaking engagement, webinar, video conference or Zoom meeting. The booking agents at Athlete Speakers work to get you the best price for your desired sports personality.

Athlete Speakers is a leader when it comes to booking virtual events in the sports world. Since 1999, we have built close relationships with top athletes, agents, publicists and managers. We assist all types of companies as well as event planners with booking athletes like Serena Williams for these virtual engagements. Companies continue to turn to Athlete Speakers to get Serena Williams’s latest virtual speaking fee, appearance cost and schedule availability.
